title: Devious
description:
Sophia Fern Brown and Will Clegg share stories about a shady con job in the music industry and a messy drug deal among teens.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Sophia Phern Brown, Will Clegg, Sophia Fern Brown, Taj Easton, Boom Bip and Doseone, Barefoot, Phern, Afroman, P.TAHAYA)
